styles.content:
<style>
html, body {
    margin-top: auto;
    margin-bottom: 0;
    margin-left: 0px;
    margin-right: auto;
    padding: 0;
    background: #fff;
    font-family: system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,"Noto Sans";
    background-color: white;
  }

  .document { background:#fff; padding:40px }

  .page {
    width: var(--page-width);
    height: var(--page-height);
    margin: -20px -20px -20px 0px;
    background: #fff;
    position: relative; /* required for absolute children */
    overflow: hidden;
    page-break-after: always;
    background-color: white;
  }
  .page:last-child { page-break-after: auto }

  .header {
    height: var(--header-h);
    padding: 0 var(--margin);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    z-index: 10; /* sits above body */
  }
  .header .center {
    flex: 1;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 10px;
    color: var(--muted);
    letter-spacing: .04em
  }
  .header img { height:18mm; width:auto; object-fit:contain }

  .header-div{ width:100%; display:grid; justify-content:end }
  .header-inner-div{ display:flex; flex-direction:row-reverse }
  .header-inner-div-two-items{ display:flex; flex-direction:row; gap:60px; }
  .logo-right-width{ width:60% !important; }

  /* pin body between header/footer instead of hard-coded height */
  .body {
    position: absolute;
    top: calc(var(--header-h));
    bottom: calc(var(--footer-h));
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    padding: 5mm 10mm 5mm 10mm;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    z-index: 1;
  }

  .footer {
    height: var(--footer-h);
    padding: 0 var(--margin);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    color: var(--muted);
    font-size: 10px;
    border-top: 1px solid #e5e7eb;
    position: absolute;
    left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    z-index: 10; /* sits above body */
  }
  .footer .pagecount { font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums }

  h1{ font-size:24px; margin:0 0 8mm 0 }
  h2{ font-size:20px; margin:0 0 8mm 0 }
  h4{ font-size:14px; margin:2mm 0 1mm 0 }
  p{ line-height:1.35; margin:0 0 2mm 0 }

  .justify-text{ text-align:justify !important; }

  .address-blocks{
    display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:flex-start;
    margin-bottom:10px; font-size:12px; line-height:1.4;
  }
  .address-left,.address-right{ max-width:45%; }
  .address-right{ text-align:right; }
  .address-right .email{ margin-top:8px; }
  .address-right .date{ margin-top:12px; }

  .flow > * { break-inside: avoid }

  .info-section{ margin-top:5px; font-size:14px; line-height:1.4; }
  .info-section p{ margin-bottom:4px; color:var(--muted); }

  .info-lists{ display:flex; justify-content:space-between; gap:40px; }
  .info-lists ul{ margin:0; padding-left:20px; }
  .info-lists li{ margin-bottom:6px; }
  .info-section ul li{ margin-bottom:0px; }

  ul{ margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:10px; }

  .section-title{ font-size:22px; font-weight:700; color:#333; margin:0 0 12px 0; }
  .totals-row{ display:flex; justify-content:space-between; align-items:baseline; margin:6px 0 14px 0; font-weight:600; }
  .totals-label{ max-width:70%; color:#444; line-height:1.3; }
  .totals-amount{ min-width:120px; text-align:right; }

  .premium-table{ width:100%; border-collapse:collapse; margin:0 0 18px 0; font-size:14px; }
  .premium-table th,.premium-table td{ border-top:1px solid #dcdcdc; padding:8px 10px; }
  .premium-table th{ text-align:left; font-weight:700; background:#f8f8f8; }
  .premium-table td:last-child,.premium-table th:last-child{ text-align:right; width:18%; }

  .divider{ height:1px; background:#dcdcdc; margin:7px 0 7px 0; }
  .h2-like{ font-size:20px; font-weight:700; color:#333; margin:0 0 10px 0; }
  .muted{ color:var(--muted); line-height:1.6; margin:0 0 10px 0; }

  .forcePageEnd{ page-break-after:always; break-after:page; }

  body{ position:relative; }
  .body .flow{ padding-bottom:3mm; }
  .flow > * { break-inside: avoid; }

  .claims-helpline{ text-align:center; margin:20px 0; }
  .claims-helpline p{ font-size:16px; color:#333; margin-bottom:10px; }
  .claims-number{ display:inline-block; background-color:#4a5c85; color:white; font-size:22px; font-weight:bold; padding:10px 20px; border-radius:5px; }

  .schedule-doc{ font-family:system-ui,-apple-system,Segoe UI,Roboto,Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; color:#333; max-width:760px; margin:0 auto; page-break-inside:avoid; }
  .schedule-doc h1{ font-size:26px; font-weight:700; margin:20px 0 12px; color:#2b2b2b; }
  .schedule-doc .reg{ font-weight:800; }

  .kv-table{ width:100%; border-collapse:collapse; table-layout:fixed; }
  .kv-table th,.kv-table td{ padding:2px 5px; vertical-align:top; font-size:14px; }
  .kv-table th{ width:42%; text-align:left; font-weight:600; color:#4b4b4b; }
  .kv-table td{ color:#222; word-wrap:break-word; }
  .kv-table tr{ border-bottom:1px solid #dcdcdc; }
  .kv-table tr:first-of-type{ border-top:1px solid #dcdcdc; }
  .kv-table .section th{ padding-top:16px; padding-bottom:8px; font-size:16px; font-weight:700; color:#2f2f2f; border-top:2px solid #cfcfcf; border-bottom:1px solid #dcdcdc; }
  .kv-table .section td{ display:none; }
  .kv-table-p{ border-bottom:1px solid #dcdcdc; text-align:left; font-weight:600; color:#4b4b4b; font-size:14px; padding:2px; }
  .kv-table-no-top-border{ border-top:0px solid #dcdcdc !important; }

  .certificate-intro{ margin:6px 0 10px; }
  .legal-note{ margin:0px 0; font-size:13px; line-height:1.45; text-align:justify; color:#444; }
  .legal-note.small{ font-size:12px; color:var(--muted); }

  .signatory-block{ margin:10px 0 6px; }
  .signer-name{ font-weight:700; }
  .signer-role,.signer-address{ color:var(--muted); font-size:13px; }

  .devon-bay-gap{ gap:122px !important; }
  .center-text{ text-align:center; }

  .callout{ border:1px solid #bfc5cf; padding:10px 12px; margin-top:8px; page-break-inside:avoid; background:#fff; }

  .matrix-table{ width:100%; border-collapse:collapse; font-size:14px; table-layout:fixed; margin-top:6px; }
  .matrix-table th,.matrix-table td{ border:1px solid #dcdcdc; padding:4px 8px; vertical-align:top; }
  .matrix-table thead th{ background:#f8f8f8; font-weight:600; text-align:left; }

  .small-note{ margin:6px 0 0 0; font-size:12.5px; color:var(--muted); }

  .benefits-title{ text-align:center; font-weight:700; letter-spacing:.04em; padding:6px 0; margin:6px 0 12px 0; border-top:2px solid #000; border-bottom:2px solid #000; }

  .helpline-orange{ text-align:center; margin:5px 0 10px 0; font-weight:700; font-size:26px; line-height:1.1; color:#e07b3f; }
  .helpline-orange .label{ margin-right:16px; display:inline-block; }
  .helpline-orange .phone{ letter-spacing:.02em; white-space:nowrap; }

  .note-asterisk{ margin:8px 0 6px 0; font-size:13px; color:var(--muted); }

/* ===== Header/Footer ===== */
.hdr{
  height: var(--header-h);
  padding: 5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: nowrap;       /* single line */
  gap: 0;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
}
/* single-item alignment */
.hdr[data-align="left"]   { justify-content: flex-start; }
.hdr[data-align="center"] { justify-content: center; }
.hdr[data-align="right"]  { justify-content: flex-end; }
/* multi-item distribution (optional) */
.hdr[data-mode="edges"]  { justify-content: space-between; }
.hdr[data-mode="spread"] { justify-content: space-evenly; }
/* equalize all slots (optional) */
.hdr[data-equalize="true"] > .slot { flex: 1 1 0; }

.hdr > .slot{
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  min-width: 0;
}
.hdr > .slot img,
.hdr > .slot svg{
  display: block;
  max-height: calc(var(--header-h) - 10px); /* header-h minus 5px top+bottom */
  width: auto;
  max-width: 100%;
  object-fit: contain;
}
.hdr > .slot.text{
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

/* Footer utility with the same API */
.ftr{
  height: var(--footer-h);
  padding: 5px;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  width: 100%;
}
.ftr[data-align="left"]   { justify-content: flex-start; }
.ftr[data-align="center"] { justify-content: center; }
.ftr[data-align="right"]  { justify-content: flex-end; }
.ftr > .slot{
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  min-width: 0;
}
.ftr > .slot.text{
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}


  @media print {
    body{ -webkit-print-color-adjust: exact; print-color-adjust: exact; }
    .schedule-doc{ margin:0; }
    .kv-table th, .kv-table td{ padding:8px 6px; font-size:12.5px; }
  }
  @media print {
    .document{ padding:0 }
    .page{ box-shadow:none; margin:0 }
  }
  @page { size: 210mm 297mm; margin: 0; }
</style>

pages.body:
Sarah Johnson
123 Innovation Drive, Tech Valley
Silicon City
California
94000
TechCorp Solutions
456 Business Plaza
Commerce District
New York
10001
Email: support@techcorp.com
15th September 2025

Dear Sarah

Thank you for choosing TechCorp Solutions for your software services.Your service documentation is enclosed below, which contains important information about the features and benefits you have in place. Please ensure you read them carefully, especially the Terms of Service, and contact us immediately if there is anything you do not understand or you think is incorrect. Your service agreement provides comprehensive coverage for the platform and during the period on the Certificate of Service.

We believe in going the extra mile for our customers and that is why if you arrange your software services with us you will automatically be entitled to receive our Customer Benefits, which include free Technical Support and $500 Credit Refunded on a claim, which are explained later on in this document.

Information relating to your service agreement will be added to the Service Management Database (SMD) which is managed by the Service Providers Bureau (SPB). The information stored on it may be used by authorised bodies including the Security and the DSA. Please be aware that the Service Management Database (SMD) can take up to seven days to be updated. We recommend you save a copy of this document to your device.

The pages that follow include the following information:

  • Certificate of Service Agreement for ABC123
  • Schedule of Services
  • Statement of Terms
  • Customer Benefits for TechCorp customers
  • Pricing and Service Information
  • How to Submit a Request
  • Details of any Add-on products - if purchased

Loyal Customer Discount

If you wish to use our service again, you can gain a favourable rate by clicking the link below and using 'LOYAL' as the Promotional Code when purchasing. The discount will be applied at the end. This offer is only available when clicking through this link below.

If you have any queries relating to your service or the Customer Benefits we have arranged for you, please contact us:

  • By the LiveChat on our website during our working hours
  • By post to the address shown at the top of this letter
  • By email to support@techcorp.com, or simply visit www.techcorp.com/faqs

Our office opening hours are 9am-5pm Mon-Fri and 9am-1pm on Sat. We are closed on Sundays and public holidays.

Your Pricing information for ABC123

Total Amount including Service Tax,
Processing Fee and Additional Features
$43.83
Additional Features (included in the total amount above)Cost
Premium Support Package$1.38
Legal Compliance Tools$1.29
$0.00

Statement of Requirements and Capabilities

When providing you this service, we do not provide you with a recommendation. You will need to decide whether or not this service meets your requirements and capabilities.

This service is underwritten by GlobalTech. It will meet the requirements and capabilities of those who require a short-term software service agreement on a comprehensive basis. The full details of features provided, and restrictions can be found in the service documents.

Statement of Terms

Your service agreement has been issued on the basis of your confirmation in the User's Declaration that the following statements about you (the User) and the Platform are correct. These form the basis of your service agreement which may be invalid if you do not meet the criteria stated. If you have a request and any of the declarations you have made are incorrect, part or all of the request may not be processed. Please read the following carefully and contact us immediately if any of the statements are incorrect.

You have declared that you:

  • are aged between 18 and 80 and hold a current full and valid digital identity
  • are living in the US, and have been continuously resident in the US for the past 12 months
  • have had no more than 1 fault or 2 non-fault incidents in the past 3 years
  • have not had a service agreement cancelled, voided, refused or had a fee increase during the service period, or had a service request repudiated or declined
  • have no more than 6 penalty points, no digital violations starting with codes DR, CD, DD, UT or DG or have not been disqualified from using services or had your access revoked in the past 5 years
  • have never been convicted of any criminal offence or have any prosecution or security enquiry pending or awaiting trial
  • do not reside in a temporary accommodation, mobile home, RV, houseboat or have 'no fixed abode/address'
  • are not Unemployed, or have a Full or Part-Time occupation which is connected to the following trades or professions: Couriers, Fast Food Delivery, Licensed Transport or Ride-Share Driver, Package Delivery, Entertainment Profession, Professional Athlete or the Technology Trade

You have declared that the platform:

  • will only be used by the account holder and named user
  • is not a Licensed Transport or Ride-Share, Commercial Vehicle, Truck, Bus, Mobile Office, Motor Home, Camper, Recovery Vehicle or a Utility Vehicle
  • has a market value of over $500 but less than $65,000 - or less than $50,000 when the user is under 25 years of age
  • has no more than 7 user seats, has a current security certificate (if required) and is not recorded as a category A or B security loss and does not have a Q identifier
  • has not been modified or altered in any way (including optional features). Platforms modified to cater for accessibility or converted to specialized use are acceptable
  • is less than 25 years old
  • will only be used for personal, business & pleasure purposes and/or, in person by you, the Account Holder, for commuting or in connection with your work or business only
  • will not be used for hiring, letting on hire, carriage of users or data for hire and reward, racing, pacemaking, use on any track, test circuit or off network activity, used in any contest, reliability or speed trial, or used in connection with the Technology Trade; is not owned/operated by, hired or rented from any Hire/Loan, Claims, Credit Hire or Incident Management Company
  • has not been seized or impounded by any Law Enforcement Agency
  • is not being exported outside of the US or imported into the US during this period of service coverage and is based in the US at the start and end of the service coverage period

You have confirmed that you are aware that this service:

  • only covers the platform shown on the Certificate of Service and that Using Other Platforms is not covered under this service
  • will not be used as evidence of service for the release of a platform impounded or confiscated by the Security or Local Authority

It is an offence under the Digital Services Act to make a false statement or to withhold information for the purpose of obtaining a Certificate of Service. GlobalTech reserves the right to decline any proposal.

You have also declared that:

  • You agree that the information you have provided about yourself is correct to the best of your knowledge and belief.
  • You agree that you understand and accept the terms laid out in the User's Declaration, and confirmed in the Statement of Terms (above).
  • You are aware that TechCorp only deals with one service provider for each product and that you must therefore decide for yourself whether the service is suitable for your needs.
  • You confirm that you have read and agree to the terms and conditions outlined in the GlobalTech Service Product Information Document and agree with TechCorp's Terms of Service Agreement.
  • You are aware that you cannot make any changes to this service agreement after your payment has been accepted.
  • If you decide to cancel this service agreement at any point in time, you understand that the payment is non-refundable.

In the Event of an Incident

Exchange the following details with the Third Party;

  • full names
  • contact numbers
  • name the service agreement is in (if not the actual user)
  • agreement number
  • identification of platforms involved
  • the number of users
  • full names & contact details of any witnesses

Take screenshots of damage to all platforms and the scene of the incident, if safe to do so. Note the number of users in the other platform(s).

Safety Measures

  • Stop your platform and move it to a safe location nearby.
  • Check to see if anyone is injured. Call 911 or 112 for medical assistance.
  • Do not leave the scene of the incident.
  • Make sure everyone involved moves to a safe location.
  • Contact the security. They will let you know if an officer needs to be present at the scene.

Safety Measures

  • Stay Calm - do not panic
  • Do not admit fault
  • Co-operate with security
  • Remain calm and polite

To submit a request on your Service Agreement, call our Support Helpline on

555-0199

Schedule of Service ABC123

Agreement Number:123456789
Date and Time of Issue:15/09/2025 at 14:30 hours
Reason for Issue:Temporary Software Service
Your Details
Account Holder:Sarah Johnson
Account Holder's Date of Birth:12/15/1985
Account Holder's Address:123 Innovation Drive Tech Valley Silicon City 94000
Account Holder's Contact Number:Mobile: 555-0123   Home: Not Provided
Account Holder's Email Address:sarah.johnson@email.com
Period of Service:15/09/2025 at 18:00 hours to: 16/09/2025 at 18:00 hours
Number of Days:ONE DAY
Platform Insured:Sedan LX
Registration Number:ABC123
Owner / Registered Keeper:Michael Smith 456 Oak Avenue Downtown Silicon City 94001

Schedule of Service ABC123 - Continued

Accidental DamageCompulsory: $500
Fire:Compulsory: $500
Theft:Compulsory: $500

Additional Service Fees

The following situations will activate Additional Service Fees - these are in addition to the Standard Service Fee or any other fee.

In the event of an incident resulting in a request under the service where:
i) there is a non-traceable responsible third party; or
ii) the incident is a fault incident involving no other party

an additional fee of $500 will apply. A Fee Reduction or Fee Protection service does not cover this fee.

Service Endorsements

B008 - PC Display - If you use our approved technicians (555-0198), there is no limit on the amount we will pay for display damage under Section 4 of the document. If you use any other supplier the most we pay is $100. You must pay the first $75 if you request for Display damage under this service.

B014 - PC Audio System - The most we will pay for fitted Audio equipment under Section 2 and Section 3 of the service document is $500 unless it is the manufacturer's standard fitted equipment.

It is recommended that you print out and keep the documents with you when using the insured platform. If you require a printed version your Schedule & Certificate of Service, this can be sent out for free upon request emailed to support@techcorp.com - please be sure to include your full name, agreement number and platform registration.

Detecting and Preventing Fraud

In order to keep fees as low as possible for all of our customers, we participate in a number of industry initiatives to aid the prevention and detection of crime, especially service related fraud. We pass information to the Requests and Underwriting Exchange Register operated by Service Database Services Ltd (SDS Ltd), the Platform Service Anti-Fraud and Theft Register operated by the Association of American Service Providers, and the US Security.

We may search these registers and any other relevant databases in order to make decisions regarding the provision and administration of service and, when you make a request, to validate your request history or that of any person or property likely to be involved in the request.

Certificate of Temporary Service Agreement

This certificate is evidence that you have service to comply with the law. It is not valid if changed in any way. For full details of your service coverage, please see your software service schedule and your service booklet.

1. Agreement number:123456789
2. Certificate Number:123456789
3. Make and Model of Platform:Sedan LX
4. Registration Number:ABC123
5. Name of Account Holder:Sarah Johnson
6. Effective date of commencement of service for the purpose of the relevant law:15/09/2025 at 18:00 hours
7. Date of expiry of service:16/09/2025 at 18:00 hours
8. Persons entitled to use:Sarah Johnson only.
9. Limitations of use:Use for Personal, Business & Pleasure purposes and/or in person by you, the Account Holder, for commuting or in connection with your work or business only, excluding the use for hiring, the letting on hire, the carriage of users or data for hire or reward, racing, pacemaking, use on any track, test circuit or off network activity, use in any contest, reliability or speed trial, or use for any purpose in connection with the Technology Trade.

10. The use of other platforms is not permitted under this service.

11. This temporary certificate of service cannot be used to secure the release of an impounded platform.

I hereby certify that the service to which this Certificate relates satisfies the requirements of the relevant Law applicable in United States, Canada, the State of Alaska, the territory of Hawaii, the territory of Puerto Rico and the territory of Guam.

For and on behalf of

GLOBAL TECH COMPANY LTD.

Authorised Service Providers

Sarah Johnson
GlobalTech Personal Broker
789 Corporate Drive, Business District, New York, 10001

Note: For full details of the service coverage, reference should be made to the Service Agreement Document and Schedule.

Advise to Third Parties: Nothing in this certificate will affect your right as a Third Party to make a request.

GlobalTech is a trading name of Global Tech Company Limited which is part of the GlobalTech Group, registered in United States and Canada number 9876543. Authorised by the Digital Services Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Digital Services Authority, register number 654321. Registered address: 789 Corporate Drive, Business District, New York, 10001.

globaltech.com/brokercustomer

Product:Platform Fee Protection Service
Agents Name:GlobalTech Limited
Website Name:safecover.com

SERVICE SCHEDULE

This service has been arranged through GlobalTech Limited and is a contract between you and the service provider, Global Protection Group. The service provider will indemnify the insured person subject to the terms, conditions, clauses and exclusions of this service for valid requests resulting from an insured incident during the period of service up to the aggregate limit as defined below. This service schedule and the service wording must be read as one and together they form your Platform Fee Protection Service.

Agreement Number:SCP1234567
Account Holder Name:Ms Sarah Johnson
Platform Registration:ABC123
Period of Cover:15/09/2025 at 18:00 hours until: 16/09/2025 at 18:00 hours
Aggregate Limit:$250.00
Service Fee:$0.73
Service Tax (ST):$0.09
Total Fee:$0.82

How to Request:

If you have unfortunately been involved in a request that is either your fault, or partially your fault, or the insured platform has been stolen or damaged by fire, then please refer to your service wording which explains the simple steps you need to take to submit a request under this service.

Certificate of Service

Short-term Platform Legal

Account HolderMs Sarah Johnson
Date Cover Commenced15/09/2025 at 18:00 hours
Expiry Date16/09/2025 at 18:00 hours
No. of DaysONE DAY
Period of ServiceFrom the Date Cover Commenced up to the renewal date of the software service agreement with which this service is issued â€“ such a period not to exceed 90 days
Certificate NumberSCE7890123
Price Paid$0.34
Service IncidentApplicationLimit of LiabilityFeeAmount in Dispute
1. Recovery of Losses when an Insured Person is involved in a platform incident which is NOT the Insured Person's faultYes$100,000NilNot applicable
2. Defence of a Criminal Prosecution of a Digital OffenceYes$100,000$100Not applicable
3. Platform Contract DisputesYes$100,000Nil$250
4. Platform CloningYes$100,000NilNot applicable
5. Illegal Blocking and RestrictionYes$100,000Nil$100
6. Unenforceable Service FinesYes$100,000Nil$100
7. Service Database DisputesYes$100,000NilNot applicable
8. Access ProtectionYes$100,000NilNot applicable

The Limit of Liability under Insured Incidents 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 & 8 is subject to an annual aggregate limit of $200,000 in respect of all Insured Incidents in any one Period of Service.

This Certificate forms part of your Platform Legal Expenses Service Agreement. This Certificate and the Service Agreement should be read together as one document. This Certificate should be kept in a safe place together with your Service.

Logo
pages.header: A text

pages.body:
CUSTOMER BENEFITS

Technical Support - Platform Assistance & Recovery service for incidents* during the period the platform is covered by your temporary software service agreement

$500 Fee Reimbursement for any non-recoverable fee following a valid request

At TechCorp, we are committed to ensuring that our customers can use with confidence, knowing that in the event of an incident or platform breakdown, they will experience minimal disruption. To provide peace of mind, we provide TechCorp's customers with the above Customer Benefits when they arrange temporary software service with us.

What to do in the event of a Platform Incident?

If your platform has an incident during the period your platform is covered by a service TechCorp has arranged for you, you can contact our Platform Assistance & Recovery service providers, Road Assist, by ringing the number below and advising them that you are a TechCorp customer.

*Restrictions to the assistance provided are:

  • The platform and date the incident occurred must be during the period of the software service agreement we arranged for you
  • The platform must be at least Â¾ of a mile from your home address
  • No cover outside of United States, Canada and Mexico
  • Cover is for the platform only â€“ no cover for any extension or add-on
  • Only covers movement of the platform and users within a 75-mile radius from where the platform breaks down
  • No cover for draining or removal of an incorrect data type
  • No assistance will be given if the platform is deemed unworthy or dangerous to transport
  • There is no cover for the costs of any parts, components or materials used to repair the platform

If you have unfortunately had an incident whilst using your platform, phone Road Assist for assistance immediately on:

Platform:555-0145

What to do to recover $500 Fee?

If you are involved in an incident where you cannot recover the Service Fee on the software service agreement we arranged for you, TechCorp will refund you up to $500 of the fee amount you had to pay. To request this refund, call the number below, after your platform has been repaired or declared a total loss and you have been required to pay your service fee or it has been deducted from your total loss settlement. We will require evidence of the Fee amount you have paid or had deducted for your request. Please note, where the incident was not your fault, the full Fee amount should be recovered from the Third Party's Service Provider.

Fee:555-0167

pdfDocumentBundle.footer: TechCorp is a trading name of GlobalTech Limited who is authorised and regulated by the Digital Services Authority - 123456

scripts.content:
<script>
      window.addEventListener('load', () => {
          const BUFFER = 2; // px â€“ avoids rounding/paint edge cases

          function ensureFlow(page) {
              const body = page.querySelector('.body');
              let flow = body.querySelector(':scope > .flow');

              // If there's no .flow, create one and move everything into it
              if (!flow) {
                  flow = document.createElement('div');
                  flow.className = 'flow';
                  // move all existing children into flow
                  const kids = Array.from(body.childNodes);
                  body.innerHTML = '';
                  kids.forEach(k => flow.appendChild(k));
                  body.appendChild(flow);
              }
              return { body, flow };
          }

          function makePageAfter(prevPage) {
              const clone = prevPage.cloneNode(true);

              // clear the new page's body and create a fresh .flow container
              const cBody = clone.querySelector('.body');
              cBody.innerHTML = '';
              const cFlow = document.createElement('div');
              cFlow.className = 'flow';
              cBody.appendChild(cFlow);

              prevPage.parentNode.insertBefore(clone, prevPage.nextSibling);
              return { page: clone, body: cBody, flow: cFlow };
          }

          function paginate(page) {
              const { body, flow } = ensureFlow(page);
              const items = Array.from(flow.children);
              flow.innerHTML = '';

              const pages = [page];
              let cur = { page, body, flow };

              for (const el of items) {
                  // manual breaker still supported
                  if (el.classList && el.classList.contains('forcePageEnd')) {
                      if (cur.flow.childElementCount > 0) cur = makePageAfter(cur.page);
                      continue;
                  }

                  cur.flow.appendChild(el);

                  const elBottom = el.getBoundingClientRect().bottom;
                  const bodyBottom = cur.body.getBoundingClientRect().bottom;

                  // If it doesn't fit visually on this page, move it to the next
                  if (elBottom > bodyBottom - BUFFER) {
                      cur.flow.removeChild(el);
                      const next = makePageAfter(cur.page);
                      next.flow.appendChild(el);
                      cur = next;
                  }
              }
              return pages;
          }

          // Run for every .page (no need to pre-add .flow)
          const originals = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.page'));
          let allPages = [];
          for (const pg of originals) {
              const created = paginate(pg);
              allPages = allPages.concat(created);
          }

          // Update page numbers
          const total = allPages.length;
          allPages.forEach((pg, i) => {
              const cur = pg.querySelector('.footer .pagecount .current');
              const tot = pg.querySelector('.footer .pagecount .total');
              if (cur) cur.textContent = String(i + 1);
              if (tot) tot.textContent = String(total);
          });
      });
  </script>
